reviews.review_title: Nice location, confortable rooms, but serious lack of trees and shade.
reviews.positive_text: The location was good. There were some armchairs and pamlags in the shade which were very confortable, even to work a bit. The view from there was fantastic. The pool area was convenient after 5 o c'clock, before that time there was no shade there and the sun was burning. We liked the bar snacks such as the salads and a local cheese and little pieces of pastas together. The lake is wonderful and its water is very pleasant and clean. My husband liked the sauna.
reviews.negative_text: They wanted to charge EUR 35 per person for the breakfast - we did not find that worthwhile. There are not enough trees in the garden. This is why there is no enough shade. People tried to escape from the burning sun but there were only few sufficient options. The lake are was OK, but there were no deckchairs we could only sit on the ground. There are not too many benches there. The deckghairs in the pool area are not confortable due to the hot tempretaure, the burning sun and the lack of shades. We had once a dinner in the hotel. It is considered as a sort of fine dineng. We had similar experienec in different countries earlier. This one we found low value/price, while the lady was pushing us to order more vine and more food.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful location and comfortable room, but a bit expensive for only four-star quality.
reviews.positive_text: Exceptional location by the lake, overlooking the bike path. Very nice heated pool (26C) and terrace. Good spa with large sauna and hammam and modest indoor pool (28C). The room and balcony were lovely - light and spacious.
reviews.negative_text: Many minor points that showed a lack of attention to maintenance including poor ventilation in the bathroom, which smelled a bit moldy. The WiFi in the room hardly worked - not at all for our phones and only very slowly with a computer. Two electricity sockets in the room didn't work and neither did several lights in the garden. In the spa, there were puddles by the entrance for no apparent reason. One shower head sprayed water on the ceiling and the pool had a high chlorine level while not being especially warm. Not critical, but it's not really a five star hotel.

reviews.review_title: An outstanding property with beautiful grounds against an enviable lake & mountain view:)
reviews.positive_text: The location was amazing.  The facilities were great!  Our lake view suites exceeded expectations. Black Bass is a 10 minute taxi ride and a 20 minute bike ride.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast & dinner on hotel property was very pricey.  The dinner the first night was outstanding and made up for the cost.  The steam room was not open and working in the spa area we tried to use the sauna and that was not turned on for use 2 days in a row when made mgmt aware we were told the sauna would be turned on within 10 minutes that didn't happen not a game changer but it was a disappointment considering it was a service provided alongside a beautiful indoor spa pool to not be able to experience both was a bummer.

- Very nice location by the lake, approx 40 min by foot from Annecy

- The hotel staff is nice

reviews.negative_text:
- The room with "Forrest View" actually has a view on the parking lot. The windows are small thus the room is quite dark. 
- The bathroom is not comfortable : the shower has no door and soaks the entire bathroom floor. 
- Breakfast is way too simple, and overpriced for 29 euros
- The housekeeper entered without knocking at 8.30am, 2 days in a row
- The hotel is nice, but is much rather a 4* than a 5* : the experience is overpriced and not good value for money.

reviews.positive_text: Breakfast was good, but too expensive (35 EUR) per person per day. We were 4, so there went 140 EUR. The rooms were large and nicely decorated. The room was spotless and the bed was comfy.
reviews.negative_text: We were overcharged 100 EUR at the restaurant. They added an extra wine and desserts we did not order. When I mentioned this to the server, she did not apologise at all. She said "I'll be back with the correct bill." When she came back, again no apology. She said "Can you please check this bill?" In the US, we would have gotten an apology and perhaps some free goodies. In Japan, the manager of the restaurant would have apologised personally and bowed. Here, we were treated very bad. After I said that the second check was correct, she asked me "Where are you from?"... What does that matter??? Are you a racist overcharging depending on origin?
reviews.room_name: Suite Junior avec Vue sur la For√™t

reviews.positive_text: Everyone on staff (front desk, room cleaners, restaurant waiters. Bar tender) was absolutely amazing. They were hospitable, friendly, and professional. The room was lovely, with tasteful decor and nice amenities. I ordered the full tasting menu in the restaurant and every dish was fantastic. I absolutely loved the flavor combinations. I tried two different cocktails over my stay, with Clement (the bartender) making me a drink of his choice each time. They were delicious! Rubin, my waiter, also gave me recommendations for local events that were helpful. Wonderful stay & I would love to come back in future.

The view from our hotel room, over the lake, made this worth every penny. Staff were very helpful and the whole place was pet friendly. Sitting out on the terrace in the evening was lovely and plenty of places to walk the dog (the hotel backs onto a cycle path that's between the hotel and lake).

Een fantastische lokatie, direct aan het meer. Achteruitgang met een pad om een mooie wandeling te maken. Eigen en gratis parkeerterrein. Ik heb genoten van de Spa, hoewel tijdens onze dagen de hamam niet werkte. Honden toegelaten (20 euro per hond per dag). Een ontbijt om nooit meer te vergeten.

Een nadeel is de geluidsisolatie. Het schuiven van de stoelen in de kamers is zeer luidruchtig. Tevens werd er naast ons harde muziek gespeeld, wat zeer goed hoorbaar was. Wij sliepen tegen een muur, waar het toilet van buren zat. 
Een keer was onze kamer niet schoongemaakt, wij moesten een half uur wachten, het was netjes geweest, als wij iets aangeboden hadden gekregen.

Het heeft 5 sterren door de faciliteiten, niet mede door de service.

reviews.positive_text:
I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Annecy!

It has an excellent location right in front of the lake, and they offer free parking, which is a huge plus.

The hospitality and service were exceptional‚Äîquick and very welcoming.

They also have unique names for the rooms instead of just numbers, which gives the place a warm and personalized feel.

As soon as you arrive, someone greets you, gives you a tour of the hotel, showing all the services like the spa, gym, restaurant, swimming pool and your room. They also welcome you with a cake and take care of your luggage.

There's a small gym and renting electric bikes as well for those who want to stay active during their stay. Although the room's ceiling was a bit low due to the unique roof design, it added a cozy touch.

***** Additionally, for Muslim travelers, there's a water hose in the toilet, which is very convenient.

Overall, a great place to stay!

Special thanks to Julien, Giulia, Jolan and Ilina for your kindness
